Player History
Signed as a free agent by Pittsburgh on 4/1/1985 to a minor league deal...
Had first career hit on 5/3/1986, off Dennis Martinez (STL)...
Hit first career homerun on 5/15/1986, off Mario Soto (CIN)...
Injured on 4/28/1987 with a Torn Hip Muscle, out for 2-3 weeks...
Hit 3 homeruns against Chicago, driving in 4 runs on 9/19/1987...
Hit 3 homeruns against Chicago, driving in 5 runs on 9/23/1987...
2/2/1988: Gets a new one-year contract worth $4,150,000 through salary arbitration...
Injured on 5/12/1988 with a Inflamed Abdominal Muscle, out for one week...
Drove in 6 runs against Atlanta on 7/17/1988...
Won Player of the Week award on 7/24/1988, hitting .444 with 3 HR, 11 RBI...
2/2/1989: Gets a new one-year contract worth $4,885,714 through salary arbitration...
2/2/1990: Gets a new one-year contract worth $4,885,714 through salary arbitration...
Was selected to the 1990 Allstar game...
Won Player of the Week award on 8/14/1990, hitting .524 with 2 HR, 8 RBI...
Won Batter of the Month award on 9/1/1990, hitting .426 with 6 HR, 28 RBI...
Had 26-game hitting streak snapped on 9/1/1990...
Signed as a free agent by Pittsburgh on 2/3/1991 to a 6-year deal worth $29,999,999 per year...
Had 5 hits with 0 RBI against San Diego on 5/10/1991...
